quiz_info.instruction: Read each story and determine the main idea. Select the correct answer.<\/p><\/div>

questions.question:
John likes to ride his bike. He rides it every day after school. He rides it on weekends to the park. His bike is the best gift he has ever received. He enjoys riding his bike.<\/p>

What is the main idea of this story?<\/p><\/div>

answersFake.text: You can take your bike to the park.

questions.question:
Lisa is going to visit her grandmother. She loves going to the countryside to see her. She loves the animals and the picking of the crops. Then her grandmother sits down with her to read stories.<\/p>

What is the main idea of the story?<\/p><\/div>

answersFake.text: Lisa's grandma lives in the countryside.

answersTrue.text: Lisa likes spending time with grandma.

questions.question:
There are three stars the shine all night. The stars light up the night. I watch them every night because they are so beautiful. <\/p>

What is the main idea of the story?<\/p><\/div>

answersTrue.text: The stars are beautiful and light the sky.

answersFake.text: Put the pieces of bread together.

answersTrue.text: Spread the peanut butter and jelly on the bread.

questions.question: What is the last step on making a peanut butter sandwich?<\/p><\/div>

answersFake.text: Spread the peanut butter and jelly on the bread.

quiz_info.instruction: After reading the story, The King′s Choice<\/em>, answer the following questions.<\/p><\/div>

questions.question: What was King Fernando's problem?<\/p><\/div>

answersFake.text: He was very sick and thought he was going to die soon.
His enemies were going to attack his kingdom and did not know what to do.

answersTrue.text: He was going on a long trip and he had to decide who he was going to leave in charge.

questions.question: Who was King Fernando's advisor?<\/p><\/div>
Who did the king dress up like?<\/p><\/div>
The king decided to ___ his men.<\/p><\/div>
The king select the ___ man because he was reliable.<\/p><\/div>
What do you predict will happen after the King selects who will be in charge?<\/p><\/div>

answersFake.text: He will invite the young man to the kingdom.
He will go to the forest again.

answersTrue.text: He will go on his trip without worries.

questions.question: What do you predict will happen before the King leaves for his trip?<\/p><\/div>

answersFake.text: He will ask the fairy for advice.
He will dress up as the woodcutter again and go on vacation in the forest.

answersTrue.text: He will announce who will be in charge.

quiz_info.instruction: Read the following biography and answer the questions. Select the correct answer.<\/p><\/div>

questions.question: Why was Helen different from the rest of the children?<\/p><\/div>

answersTrue.text: She lost her sight and hearing.

questions.question: How did she communicate with her parents?<\/p><\/div>

answersFake.text: She used a piece of paper to write.

questions.question: What was her reaction when nobody understood what she wanted?<\/p><\/div>

answersFake.text: Anne taught her how to talk.

answersTrue.text: Anne used her sense of touch to express.

questions.question: Why was Anne able to connect with Helen's problem?<\/p><\/div>

answersFake.text: Anne had a friend who was blind.
Anne had a cousin who was blind.
